title: Win a 2025 Étape du Tour three-night VIP package including two race entries
content:
Cyclist
Win a 2025 Étape du Tour three-night VIP package including two race entries

The 2025 edition of the Étape du Tour will closely follow Stage 19 of the Tour de France, taking cyclists from Albertville to La Plagne. On July 20th, 17,000 amateur cyclists will tackle a 131 km route from Albertville to La Plagne.

While not the 2025 Tour’s longest stage, its demanding nature is undeniable, featuring five climbs. Highlights include the Col de Saisies, Col du Pré and the famous Cormet de Roselend, echoing the 1987 showdown between Stephen Roche and Pedro Delgado. The final climb is a gruelling 19.1 km ascent to La Plagne.

Sports Tours International has three package options available, each including accommodations, pre-race briefings and on-site support from their team. Start line area packages offer convenient easy access on race day, while finish line area packages bring you closer to the finish in La Plagne with post-race transfers. For a premium experience, the VIP package includes spa amenities, private transfers and celebratory drinks.

Why not enter their competition for the chance to win a 3-night stay VIP stay at the Radiana Hotel and Spa on a half board basis, with 2 entries into the 2025 Étape du Tour? Entries close on 6th January 2025 – terms and conditions can be found when entering.
